entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Ogoki
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:43 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
